short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See at a glance whehter a github repository is still resolving issues or not.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display metrics from https://isitmaintained.com/ while browsing Github and tell without any extra click whether or not a project has been abandoned.
